text: The AVN Award for Female Performer of the Year is presented every January in Las Vegas, Nevada at the AVN Awards ceremony sponsored and presented by the American adult video industry trade magazine Adult Video News (AVN). It represents the female porn star who has had the best body of work in the previous year. It has been given annually since 1993. Tori Black was the first two-time winner, winning back-to-back in 2010 and 2011. Angela White was the first three-time winner, winning back-to-back-to-back in 2018, 2019 and 2020. Kira Noir became the first black woman to win the award in 2023. ==Winners and nominees== ===1990s=== Year Photo Winner Nominees 1993 Ashlyn Gere 1994 Debi Diamond Rebecca Bardoux Celeste Ashlyn Gere Shayla LaVeaux Leena Tiffany Mynx P.
